attributes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conform
the base architecture for crowdsales. They are *not* intended to be modified / overriden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropiate to concatenate
behavior.
attributes.name: Crowdsale
TokenPurchase
Crowdsale

attributes.documentation: @dev fallback function ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

@dev low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
@param _beneficiary Address performing the token purchase
attributes.name: buyTokens
_preValidatePurchase

attributes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.

@title WhitelistedCrowdsale
@dev Crowdsale in which only whitelisted users can contribute.
attributes.name: WhitelistedCrowdsale

attributes.documentation: @dev Reverts if beneficiary is not whitelisted. Can be used when extending this contract.
attributes.name: isWhitelisted

attributes.documentation:
@dev Adds single address to whitelist.
@param _beneficiary Address to be added to the whitelist
attributes.name: addToWhitelist

attributes.documentation:
@dev Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.
@param _beneficiaries Addresses to be added to the whitelist
attributes.name: addManyToWhitelist

attributes.documentation:

@param _beneficiary Address to be removed to the whitelist
attributes.name: removeFromWhitelist

attributes.name: TimedCrowdsale

attributes.documentation: @dev Reverts if not in crowdsale time range.
